name: In The Dark (itch) (Pepotrouille)
description:
Game made for the 2022 2D Spooky Game Jam

Your village has been attacked by night creatures. It's your duty to turn back on the 4 lighthouses that kept it safe.

          Controls: 

WASD / ZSQD : Move the character 

Mouse to move the lamp

E to activate the lighthouses

______________________________________

Pepotrouille : Programming and Graphism

Sato and Galdriff : Concept and Ideas
